Package playn.core.gl

Changed Classes and Interfaces
AbstractCanvasGL A base class for Canvas implementations for GL backends.
GL20Buffer GLBuffer implementation based on {@code java.nio} and usable with GL20.
GL20Buffer.FloatImpl  
GL20Buffer.ShortImpl  
GL20Context A GLContext implementation based on GL20.
GLBuffer An abstraction over bulk buffers for use with GLShader and GLProgram.
GLBuffer.Float A buffer of 32-bit floats.
GLBuffer.Short A buffer of 16-bit unsigned integers.
GLContext  
GLShader Defines the interface to shaders used by the GL core.
GLShader.Attrib Provides the ability to bind a vertex attrib array.
GLShader.Core Implements the core of the indexed tris shader.
GLShader.TextureExtras The default texture extras.
GroupLayerGL  
IndexedTrisShader A GLShader implementation that decomposes quads into indexed triangles.
IndexedTrisShader.ITCore  
QuadShader.QuadCore  
Scale Encapsulates a scale factor, provides useful utility methods.
